outputs.output_descr: The objective of this Initiation Plan (IP) project is to create an evidence base that combines perspectives from existing project documents with analysis of current constraints and opportunities relating to trade and poverty reduction in Bangladesh. The project is revisiting the knowledge that UNDP currently has regarding needs and capabilities in lagging sectors and districts, and strengthening them through micro-narratives, research and cross sector consultations.

document_name: RFP for Hiring Firm for Production of 8-10 minutes Video Documentary on Pro-Poor Trade
RFP-BD-2015-019; Hiring Firm for Editing of 8-10 minutes Video Documentary on Pro-Poor Trade
